CustomField.description: High discount for exception pricing based on past sales. If a sales rep wants to use this price, they must discount the quote line manually. This discount may require approvals based on your org's approval settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: High discount for exception pricing based on past sales. If a sales rep wants to use this price, they must discount the quote line manually. This discount may require approvals based on your org's approval settings.
CustomField.label: Floor Discount (%)
